Gelong's Training in Brief, author His Holiness the XIVth Dalai Lama

Translated by and annotated by Geshe Graham Woodhouse. 2nd ed. Bylakuppe, India - Sera IMI House, 2017

Restricted to the fully ordained only. They can obtain copies from the Director, International Mahayana Institute, director@imisangha.org.

Geshe Losel is associated with The International Mahayana Institute (IMI) and a recognised teacher within the FPMT
